headline: Apollo Channels Billions Into AI Data Centers And Logistics Real Estate
summary: Apollo Global Management (NYSE:APO) has committed about $3.5b to AI data center infrastructure, including financing for xAI facilities. The firm is also leading refinancing for a large European logistics real estate portfolio, expanding its role in property infrastructure financing. These moves show Apollo allocating more capital toward technology related assets and large scale real estate platforms. Apollo Global Management, trading at about $134.54, is drawing attention as it channels...

headline: Apollo to Present at the UBS Financial Services Conference
summary: NEW YORK, Feb. 02, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apollo (NYSE: APO) today announced that Martin Kelly, Chief Financial Officer, will participate in a fireside chat at the UBS Financial Services Conference on Tuesday, February 10, 2026 at 8:50 am ET. A live webcast of the event will be available on Apollo’s Investor Relations website at ir.apollo.com. For those unable to join live, a replay will be available shortly after the event.
